thread.title: Ribbon cut on Spectrum expansion of rural broadband access in Steele County | News | southernminn.com
thread.title_full: Ribbon cut on Spectrum expansion of rural broadband access in Steele County | News | southernminn.com

title: Ribbon cut on Spectrum expansion of rural broadband access in Steele County | News | southernminn.com
text:
On Thursday, Spectrum announced the launch of Spectrum Internet, Mobile, TV and Voice services to more than 50 homes and small businesses in portions of Steele County.
